name: Re:Legend
summary: Re:Legend is a co-op simulation RPG game on PC(PS4/XBOX ONE & Nintendo Switch is also planned). Tame and raise magical being called Magnus and venture into the world of Ethia. Farm, craft, re-build village, and enjoy much more activities alone or with friends!
info:
• 平台: PC (NS/PS4/XBOX ONE待出）
  • 游戏类型: SRPG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019.8.31
  • 官方网站: https://www.play-relegend.com/
